abstract: Google and Yahoo give regulators more time to complete their antitrust probe into the deal.
snippet: Google and Yahoo give regulators more time to complete their antitrust probe into the deal.
lead_paragraph: Google and Yahoo have agreed to a “brief” delay in the planned start of their search advertising partnership to give the Justice Department additional time to investigate the antitrust implications of the deal, the companies said Friday.

headline.main: Google and Yahoo Agree to Delay Ad Deal
